summary:
Changes the astid burnt body files to different textures so you can use
your characters texture body files for default armor skins
descriptionHtml:
Name:FixMe - Astrid Body Fix
Author: IDzeroNo

Reasons To Download These
1. It's a cool mod
2. if you don't feel like editing countless nif files
3. IF a armor is displaying a burnt texture
4. To use your skin with countless armors

================================================
Info
================================================
Changes the astid burnt body files to different textures so you can use
your characters texture body files for default armor skins


Install: Drop files in Data Folder and pick .esp in game loader
Uninstall: Delete files
1.Astrid Body Fix - Alternate (Burn).esp
2.Astrid Body Fix - Alternate (Burn).bsa
3.Astrid Body Fix - Alternate (Burn).bsl

================================================
Files
================================================
\textures\actors\character\female
astridbody
astridbody_msn
astridbody_s
astridhands
astridhands_msn
astridhands_s
astridhead
astridhead_msn
astridhead_s
author: IDzeroNo
